'315' if (type1 in 'nextaired' or type1 in 'swrecommendedeps') and (type2 in 'none' or type3 in 'none') else '228' if (type1 in 'system' or type1 in 'favouriteaddons' or type1 in 'favourite' or type1 in 'weatherdaily' or type1 in 'weatherhourly') and (type2 in 'none' or type3 in 'none') else '220' if (type1 in 'nextaired' or type1 in 'swrecommendedeps') else '159'
'Shelf_Label' if (type2 in 'none' or type3 in 'none') else 'ListDetailsSmall'

'315' if (type2 in 'nextaired' or type2 in 'swrecommendedeps') and (type3 in 'none') else '228' if (type2 in 'system' or type2 in 'favouriteaddons' or type2 in 'favourite' or type2 in 'weatherdaily' or type2 in 'weatherhourly') and (type3 in 'none') else '220' if (type2 in 'nextaired' or type2 in 'swrecommendedeps') else '159'

'315' if (type3 in 'nextaired' or type3 in 'swrecommendedeps') and (type2 in 'none') else '228' if (type3 in 'system' or type3 in 'favouriteaddons' or type3 in 'favourite' or type3 in 'weatherdaily' or type3 in 'weatherhourly') and (type2 in 'none') else '220' if (type3 in 'nextaired' or type3 in 'swrecommendedeps') else '159'
'315' if (type1 in 'nextaired' or type1 in 'swrecommendedeps') else '228'
'315' if (type2 in 'nextaired' or type2 in 'swrecommendedeps') else '228'
'315' if (type3 in 'nextaired' or type3 in 'swrecommendedeps') else '228'

propertyGroup.name: widgetArtCommon
propertyGroup.property: 'keep' if (artwork1 in 'Banner' or artwork1 in 'Landscape' or artwork1 in 'ClearArt' or artwork1 in 'ClearLogo' or artwork1 in 'CharacterArt' or artwork1 in 'DiscArt') else 'scale' if (artwork1 in 'FanArt' or artwork1 in 'Thumb') else 'keep' if (path1 in 'tags' or path1 in 'genres' or path1 in 'studios' or path1 in 'actors' or path1 in 'directors' or path1 in 'country' or path1 in 'years') else 'keep' if (target1 in 'pvr' or target1 in 'radioguide' or target1 in 'tvguide') else 'scale' if (type1 in 'musicvideos' and artwork1 in 'Poster') else 'stretch'
